articles.author: Karisa Langlo
articles.title: A pink iPhone 13 rumor is going around Twitter, and we're hopeful - CNET
articles.description: A dubious photo of an apparent pink iPhone 13 made the rounds on Twitter recently and, actually, this rumor could come true.

articles.author: Joshua Swingle
articles.title: Google's Android 12 redesign leaks with theme support, new animations, more - PhoneArena
articles.description: Google's huge Android 12 redesign has leaked in full days before its announcement at Google I/O. The next version of Android includes theme support, new animations, and several other features.
articles.content: The new software will introduce a heavily redesigned user interface that includes native theming support, per the leak. Things like the new keyboard, app icons, and system app UIs will change their a… [+339 chars]
